cont.entity_a: Good value for the price.

cont.entity_b: Comfortable design but large USB receiver.

cont.entity_b: Mouse is more sensitive than previous versions.

cont.entity_a: After 14 months, the wheel stopped working.

cont.entity_a: Installation is easy.

cont.entity_a: The wheel is too smooth and feels almost loose.

cont.entity_b: Magnifier button is a useful feature.

cont.entity_a: Corded mouse eliminates battery issues.
cont.entity_b: Battery life is longer compared to other models.

cont.entity_a: Compact size is good for traveling and fits well in hand.

Good reaction sensitivity.

cont.entity_a: Blue LED is very bright and always on.
Without clicks.
